hero.title: Process Automation
hero.subtitle: Save hours per week and eliminate errors. Flows that connect sales, operations and finance.

pitch.subtitle_long: We design and automate end‑to‑end critical flows (CRM, invoicing, reporting, marketing) so your team drops the repetitive work and focuses on growth.
sales_focus: Scale sales without adding headcount: lead routing, SLAs and sequences.
Frictionless ops: onboarding, invoicing and reconciliation.
Always‑on marketing: audiences, enrichment and reporting.
Live dashboards: trustworthy data and real‑time decisions.

definition.what_is: We automate manual processes across your tools (CRM, ERP, support, marketing) with rules and bots that execute tasks, update data and notify the team without human intervention.
key_benefits: Consistent data: fewer errors and duplicates.
Shorter cycle times and better experience.

pains: Too much copy‑paste between tools and frequent errors.
Slow onboarding, invoicing or support with bottlenecks.
Lack of visibility to decide: siloed data.
deliverables: Process mapping and prioritized quick wins.
Training and operating manual for the team.

steps.title: Discovery & mapping
steps.desc: Identify bottlenecks and opportunities; define success and scope.

steps.title: Design & prioritization
steps.desc: Roadmap by impact vs effort, with quick wins first.

faqs.q: How fast are the first flows?
faqs.a: Quick wins in 1–2 weeks; 4–8 week programs depending on scope.

faqs.q: Do I need a technical team?
faqs.a: No. We hand off with training and manuals.
Hours saved, errors avoided, cycle times and internal/customer NPS.
